00001 // This class is based on Scott Bilas' singleton class from
00002 // Game Programming Gems (2000), chapter 1.3, Automatic Single Utility
00003 
00004 #ifndef _SINGLETON_H
00005 #define _SINGLETON_H
00006 
00007 #include <cassert>
00008 
00009 namespace ish
00010 {
00011 
00012 template <typename T> class Singleton
00013 {
00014 
00015         public:
00016 
00017                 Singleton( void )
00018                 {
00019                         assert( !_singleton );
00020                         int offset = (int)(T*)1 - (int)( Singleton <T>* )(T*)1;
00021                         _singleton = (T*)( (int)this + offset );
00022                 }
00023 
00024            virtual ~Singleton( void ) {  assert( _singleton );  _singleton = 0;  }
00025 
00026                 // Accessors
00027                 static T& GetInstance   ( void ) {  assert( _singleton );  return ( *_singleton );  }
00028 
00029                 static T* GetInstancePtr( void ) 
00030                 {  
00031                         assert( _singleton ); 
00032                         return ( _singleton );  
00033                 }
00034 
00035         private:
00036                 static T* _singleton;
00037 
00038 };
00039 
00040 template <typename T> T* Singleton <T>::_singleton = 0;
00041 
00042 } // end of namespace ish
00043 
00044 #endif // end of _SINGLETON_H
